channel.title: Help on Black Thread Design
channel.description: Recent content in Help on Black Thread Design

item.title: Getting help and reporting bugs
item.description: {:.no_toc} So you need help? What’s that? You are completely frustrated, about to tear your hair out with frustration? You are cursing this abomination of a library, casting it out, never to darken your hard drive again? Well, I have some good news for you! First, take a deep breath, go outside and pet some kittens or shout at them or whatever else relieves your tortured soul (seriously, don’t shout at kittens).
